properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.jdbcUrl
properties.description: JDBC URL for primary database connection

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.driverClassName
properties.description: Driver class name for primary database connection

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.hikari.minimum-idle
properties.description: Minimum idle connections in primary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum pool size for primary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout for primary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.hikari.idle-timeout
properties.description: Idle timeout for primary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.primary.hikari.max-lifetime
properties.description: Maximum lifetime for primary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.jdbcUrl
properties.description: JDBC URL for secondary database connection

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.driverClassName
properties.description: Driver class name for secondary database connection

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.hikari.minimum-idle
properties.description: Minimum idle connections in secondary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.hikari.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum pool size for secondary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.hikari.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout for secondary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.hikari.idle-timeout
properties.description: Idle timeout for secondary HikariCP pool

properties.name: spring.datasource.secondary.hikari.max-lifetime
properties.description: Maximum lifetime for secondary HikariCP pool
